pyensemblefs Documentation
==========================

Welcome to the official documentation of **pyensemblefs**, a Python library for 
ensemble-based feature selection with multiprocessing, stability analysis, and 
rich visualization tools.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Get Started

   introduction
   getting_started/index

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Tutorials

   tutorials/index
   faq

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: API Reference

   api/index
